content: The Saints can trade Cooks because of the emergence of Michael Thomas. They also have Willie Snead and Coby Fleener as receiving options as well. Brees probably wouldn’t be happy losing Cooks, but the Saints have so many other needs that trading him away (especially if he’s complaining) makes sense. If they flip him for some draft picks they can perhaps put together a defense that isn’t lagging near last in the league for the first time in many years.
